mcq.statement: What did Muhammad Ali Jauhar reportedly say to the British government at the First Round Table Conference regarding his return to India?

options.b: He threatened to start a movement.
options.c: He said he would not return to India alive unless the country was set free.

mcq.one_liner: At the First Round Table Conference, **Muhammad Ali Jauhar** famously declared he would not return to India alive unless the country was set free, preferring to die in a free country instead.
